verbose_text: However, unlike the reciprocal relationship between Cx46 and Cx43 in the lens, knockdown of Cx46 in CSCs did not increase Cx43 expression, or self-renewal, or resting membrane potential, nor did overexpression of Cx46 in non CSCs decrease Cx43 expression (data not shown), suggesting that there are additional regulatory elements between Cx46 and Cx43.
